programme.desc: In Thailand, Jeremy Wade displays his expert angling skills when he encounters the Giant Freshwater Stingray. In India's Himalayas, Wade studies savage attacks and his plan to catch the monster quickly takes a turn when he discovers it's a sacred animal.

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade embarks on a punishing mission to the heart of a thundering waterfall in the Pacific Northwest to battle an ancient river monster said to rise from the murky depths to attack swimmers.

programme.title: River Monsters

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Jeremy relives the biggest and most surprising catches of his career, right in America's backyard.

programme.title: River Monsters

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: Keeper hope that dwarf mongoose couple, Cooper and Mini, may deliver some new babies in time for Christmas, but it's not an easy ride.

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: Sloths Tina and Rico live together at the zoo, spending up to 18 hours a day asleep. For the past three years, Tina has spent her waking moments giving Rico a hard time. Now there's a plan to try and bring them closer together.

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: Porcupines Roxie and Henning have had a new baby porcupette, but living alongside eleven meerkats means that the new arrival will need to stay calm. Also, when he finally plucks up the courage to face the mob, he ends up on an unexpected adventure.

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: Sun bears Toni and Milli are having relationship issues, with Toni being given the cold shoulder. Keepers hope that romance may once again flourish in a brand-new enclosure.

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: It's time for mouse deer Una to leave her parents and meet a mate of her own. The zoo has a new space her & future partner Biani but she's proving rather shy, and hides in her new nesting box both day and night.

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: A new breeding pair of meerkats has moved to the zoo. Their aardvark housemates give them anxiety, so the meerkats are too shy to go near each other. Keepers decide to redesign the paddock to give them their space, suitable for aardvark-free romance.

programme.title: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: The Lucas Lagoons crew creates a backyard oasis in Siesta Key. They take an old, outdated pool and transform it into a natural lagoon.

programme.title: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: The Lucas Lagoons crew is asked to create a Rocky Mountain style lagoon for a family in the Florida wetlands. It doesn't take long before Lucas realises his clients will be watching him throughout the building process.

programme.title: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: A couple from Snead Island, Florida asks the Lucas Lagoons crew to create a bayside paradise. This outdoor living space, pool, spa, fire feature and kitchen will be built without any of Lucas' signature rock work.

programme.title: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: After ten years of saving and dreaming for a pool, a couple wants Lucas to build the wow factor. The crew creates a giant double-pool feature with a connecting stream and several customized surprises to deliver the 'wow' and dismiss any doubt.

programme.title: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: A multi-generational, environmentally conscious family living in a designated bird sanctuary in Osprey, FL asks design expert Lucas Congdon to create both a human pool paradise and a bird pond oasis, all in one outdated, rundown backyard.

programme.title: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: Lucas creates a tropical oasis complete with an island, a large grotto rock and a Tiki-themed cabana.

programme.title: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: Lucas is tasked with a challenging project: repair and remodel an unusable pool for a famous golfing family. Puzzled as to how this pool was even built, Lucas creates an ocean-themed pool with fire features, an infinity edge and his first water couch.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff and Hector help 40 miniature Australian shepherds rescued from a puppy mill. Vet tech Christine turns to Dr. Jeff when her elderly Chihuahua has trouble walking. And Dr. Jeff is called out to treat an alpaca with a serious infection.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Coco the Frenchie needs Dr. Jeff's help to remove a large lump from her face. Vet tech Christine faces her fear of birds while helping pigeons from Rocky Mountain Adventures, and Dr. Jeff and Baier aid a red-back turtle with an infected foot.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: An adventurous pup falls from a trampoline and it's up to Dr. Jeff and Petra to mend its broken leg. A dog called Pebbles must undergo emergency surgery for bladder stones, and Dr. Jeff also helps a young alligator with an injured tail.

programme.title: Mega Zoo
programme.desc: In order to navigate the COVID-19 global pandemic, the staff must ensure proper care for their animals. Keepers spring into action when urgent dental surgery is needed for elderly tiger Binjai, and a family of cotton top tamarin monkeys must be relocated.

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: When mama orangutan Sarkiei becomes sickly, keepers must separate her from prized son Tombol. Giraffe Dagmar becomes dangerously thin, keepers must determine whether or not to part her from calf Mburo, and the male giant otter pup goes on a hunger strike.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: An adventurous pup falls from a trampoline and it's up to Dr. Jeff and Petra to mend its broken leg. A dog called Pebbles must undergo emergency surgery for bladder stones, and Dr. Jeff also helps a young alligator with an injured tail.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff must act fast to save a kitten with head trauma. Then Dr. Amy treats a dog whose weak heart makes surgery a risk. A good Samaritan helps a family when their pit bull is hit by a car. And Dr. Baier gets a workout trying to treat two wallabies.

programme.title: Mega Zoo
programme.desc: In order to navigate the COVID-19 global pandemic, the staff must ensure proper care for their animals. Keepers spring into action when urgent dental surgery is needed for elderly tiger Binjai, and a family of cotton top tamarin monkeys must be relocated.

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: Andean bear Lima has a three-month-old cub, but keepers are concerned that her overprotective behaviour may curb its development. Later, when Lima's back is turned, cub Madidi embarks on an adventure into the paddock next door.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff operates on a dog rushed to the clinic after a growth on her neck ruptures. A family brings in their rabbit with mysterious growths on her side. The team performs a risky procedure on a pair of rescued miniature donkeys.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: An owner drives nine hours to the clinic hoping Dr. Jeff can save her dog's leg. Jeff and his team head to a wildlife sanctuary to treat a pack of wolves. When a kitten with a deformed leg needs treatment, Dr. Baier steps up to the plate.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Protect and Preserve
programme.desc: Officers Arsenault confronts a hunter accused of hunting too close to a school and damaging property.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Protect and Preserve
programme.desc: Officer Glen Lucas treks to the summit of Mt. Washington to rescue an injured hiker. Then, officers track down a trio of possible deer poachers and Officer Ron Arsenault investigates a tip about an illegal bobcat trapper.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Protect and Preserve
programme.desc: Episodes of the show with bonus content.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Protect and Preserve
programme.desc: In New Hampshire, Officer Hannett pursues an unusual recreational vehicle in a high speed chase. Officer Pushee and Trainee Driscoll encounter a group of combative speedsters and Officer Lucas races to the scene of an ATV crash.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Protect and Preserve
programme.desc: With added facts from the field, Officer Kevin Bronson races to get a driver under the influence off the road. Officer Eric Hannett catches two teenagers joyriding an ATV on a public road. Up north, Officer Bob Mancini helps evacuate an injured hiker.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Protect and Preserve
programme.desc: Officers Hannett and Boudreau interrogate a group about lighting a fire in the woods. Officers Cheney and McKee confront a sly fisherman with a habit of lying. And officers discover a lobsterman who is banned from state waters breaking the law.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Protect and Preserve
programme.desc: Officers Lucas and Cyrs attempt a treacherous rescue on Mt. Washington, while Lt. Boudreau tracks down the owner of an abandoned vehicle. Officer Hannett and Trainee Crouse investigate a man shooting squirrels. Officer Fluette responds to a bear call.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Protect and Preserve
programme.desc: Lt. Boudreau and Officer Hannett investigate a possible illegal turkey kill site, while Officer Bronson responds to a call about a snake in a bed. Officer Demler confronts a suspect about shooting a turkey on private property.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Protect and Preserve

programme.title: North Woods Law: Protect and Preserve

programme.desc: Officer Crouse responds to a call about a nuisance raccoon, while Officer Towne searches for a deer attacked by coyotes. Officer Hannett monitors a suspicious fisherman and Officer St. Pierre responds to a call about an impaired driver.

programme.title: My Christmas Dream

programme.title: A Christmas Detour

programme.desc: Jonathan Bennett, Sara Evans and Allison Miller visit.

programme.title: A Very Merry Mix-Up
programme.desc: A woman is headed to spend the holidays with her fiancé's family, but a mix up at the airport lands her at the wrong home. She quickly forms a bond with the 'wrong' family, especially the handsome son.

programme.title: Welcome to Christmas
programme.desc: A resort developer heads to Christmas, Colorado, to scope out a new piece of land. While away, she has a minor car accident and meets the towns handsome sheriff, who helps her have a Christmas to remember.

programme.title: On the 12th Date of Christmas

programme.title: Christmas Town

programme.title: Christmas with the Darlings
programme.desc: When an assistant gives her final notice, she is drawn into helping the charming, younger brother of her wealthy boss as he looks after his orphaned nieces and nephew through Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas at the Plaza
programme.desc: A historian is hired to create a Christmas display at the Plaza. While working, she learns that fate has prevailed and teamed her up with a handsome decorator to help bring the display, and their romance, to life.

programme.title: Christmas in Rome
programme.desc: An American tour guide working in Rome agrees to give a tour to a businessman. The two quickly learn that when in Rome, love prevails.

programme.title: The Christmas Cure
programme.desc: An emergency room doctor returns home for Christmas and reunites with old friends and family and is asked to take over her dad's old practice. The doctor must now choose between a new life and an old one.

programme.title: A Wish for Christmas
programme.desc: Santa grants a wish for a woman and she gets a chance to prove herself to her boss. Santa's wish only gives her 48 hours and as the clock ticks down, she channels the Christmas magic and speaks her mind all on her own.

programme.title: Christmas Land
programme.desc: When a woman inherits a Christmas tree farm from her late grandmother, she decides the sensible thing to do is sell it. However, once she revisits the farm, she falls in love with the townspeople and the farm.

programme.title: Christmas in Homestead
programme.desc: A famous actress heads to a Christmas-obsessed town to film a movie, and is thrown for a loop when a romance brews between her and a local inn keeper, who's a single dad. As she gets a taste of small-town life, she discovers the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Sleigh Bells Ring
programme.desc: A recently divorced woman struggles to get into the holiday spirit while heading up her hometown parade. With the help of a Christmas sleigh and a handsome woodworker, she is destined to turn her luck around.

programme.title: Chateau Christmas
programme.desc: A world-famous pianist returns The Chateau at Christmas to spend the holiday with her family and rediscover her passion for music.

programme.title: Christmas Wishes and Mistletoe Kisses
programme.desc: A woman is hired to decorate an estate building a few weeks before Christmas. While there, she works to break down the wall between her and the business owner, all while keeping the holiday spirit alive.

programme.title: Snow Bride
programme.desc: A reporter pretends to be the girlfriend of the son of a famous politician to help him save face over Christmas. She becomes torn between exposing newsworthy scoops about the famous family and trusting that she's falling in love for real.

programme.title: A Timeless Christmas
programme.desc: Charles Whitley travels from 1903 to 2020 where he meets Megan Turner and experiences a 21st Century Christmas.

programme.title: A Nashville Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A television producer is forced to work with the man who broke her heart on a country music Christmas special while being interrupted by Christmas spirits determined for her to revisit her past.

programme.title: Christmas in Vienna
programme.desc: Jess, a concert violinist who has lost her passion, visits Vienna for Christmas. There she finds the inspiration she has been missing with an American diplomat and his children.

programme.title: The Nine Lives of Christmas
programme.desc: A handsome bachelor sees his life change before his eyes when he adopts a stray cat.

programme.title: Sharing Christmas
programme.desc: A real estate developer is given the opportunity to transform an old shopping complex into a prime location. Unfortunately, there is one tenant who is holding out, the Christmas shop owner he met just days earlier.

programme.title: A Cookie Cutter Christmas
programme.desc: Two long-time rival school teachers duke it out during the holidays in a bake-off. With both determined to win the prize, their competitiveness could jeopardize what matters most this Christmas season.

programme.title: Double Holiday
programme.desc: A woman is tasked with throwing her companies holiday party, with her nemesis. The two must work together to mingle work and traditions to make the party a success.

programme.title: A Royal Christmas
programme.desc: A woman is whisked away to Europe when her boyfriend reveals he's actually a prince.

programme.title: Let It Snow
programme.desc: When a resort executive is sent to a newly purchased lodge in Maine with instructions to turn it into an ultra-modern resort, she finds a charming, successful lodge loaded with holiday spirit and makes a connection with the owner's handsome son.

programme.title: The Christmas Club
programme.desc: Two busy strangers are thrown together to help an elderly woman recover her lost savings. While working together, the magic of the season prevails, leading the couple to discover something they have been missing, love.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: A man loses his job right before Christmas, so he takes a temporary job selling trees. While at work, he meets a woman and her son, who are dealing with the sudden loss of her father. The two get to talking, and out of their loss, love grows.

programme.title: One Royal Holiday
programme.desc: A woman offers stranded family a place to stay during a blizzard. Unbeknownst to her, they are members of a royal family. Despite their different backgrounds, the woman shows her guests what a small-town Christmas is all about.

programme.title: A Nashville Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A television producer is forced to work with the man who broke her heart on a country music Christmas special while being interrupted by Christmas spirits determined for her to revisit her past.

programme.title: The Christmas House
programme.desc: When TV star Mike Mitchell's parents ask him to bring back a revered family tradition, he revisits the Mitchell family magic of Christmases past.

programme.title: Christmas Next Door
programme.desc: The author of bachelor lifestyle books, is left in charge of his young niece and nephew for the holidays.

programme.title: With Love, Christmas
programme.desc: An ad executive and her uptight co-worker must create the ultimate Christmas commercial. To complicate things, they are also each-others Secret Santa.

programme.title: Mingle All the Way

programme.title: Deliver by Christmas
programme.desc: A bakery owner is enchanted by a mystery client whom she has never met.

programme.title: The Christmas Ring
programme.desc: A reporter searches for the love story behind an antique engagement ring. With the help of the ring's owner's grandson, they learn the legacy his grandparent's left behind.

programme.title: Once Upon a Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: A woman falls in love with her liver donor, and his selfless gesture leads to a Christmas miracle for everyone.

programme.title: The Perfect Christmas Present
programme.desc: Tom decides to help his old college friend find the perfect gift for his girlfriend. However Tom gets too close and she ends up falling in love with him.

programme.title: The Town Christmas Forgot

programme.title: Come Dance With Me
programme.desc: A financial executive decides to learn to waltz to impress his girlfriend, but finds himself falling in love with his dance instructor.

programme.title: A Christmas Song

programme.title: Finding Christmas

programme.title: A Christmas Miracle

programme.title: Christmas on Honeysuckle Lane

programme.title: A Christmas Visitor
programme.desc: A visitor enters the lives of grieving parents to help them remember the joy of Christmas.
